Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2014 11:03AM MissQ wrote: thanks for your responses:). Wow, a month!  It's horrible having to wait for tests/results. I really feel for you xx.
Posts.Title: Will I be given any info at ultrasound appointment? MissQ WolfsLady

Posts.Content: MissQ wrote: I have a couple of questions as to what info (if any) I may acquire at my ultrasound appointment.  Will I be given a printout photo/report?  Do they give me my BIRADs number?  Do you get a BIRADs with ultrasound, or does that only apply to mammogram?  In case it differs from place to place, I'm in Ontario Canada, and I'll be going to an X-ray lab/centre that is not located in a hospital or doctors office, so I assume my family dr will contact with results. Thanks so much:) Log in to post a reply
